title: 2 Frames Per Second??
body:
Ok, so, it's been a couple of weeks since I've played league last (before now of course). But now, for some reason, when I get in game, I have a frame rate of 2 frames per second and am getting a resulting kea of 0/8/0. I don't know why this is happening but it's quite annoying on top of everything that's been going on and I'm wondering if this is a common problem due to the preseason patch and - if so - when is this going to be fixed by? I appreciate any advice. Thank you!

Edit: Also, my computer is just fine for I can open apps with ease, and go around the league home base with ease, only in-game do I have difficulty.

replies.body:
Huge drops in FPS can generally be caused by a number of different factors, though the most common are display driver or hardware issues. I'd suggest working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), which covers those common factors and a few others.

Let me know how those steps worked for you.

Yeah, it didn't work. Should I revert everything that I tried?

I did basically everything on there but there was a couple things I couldn't do: the intel thing under the first drop-down bar for example.

Thank you!

I wouldn't recommend reverting the changes, but I would recommend we escalate this to our tech specialists. We'll need to dive into some system logs to pinpoint the exact cause of this issue. I'd like you to run a set of logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our techs can take a look.

Thank you so much. I submitted it. I do hope everything works out. Thank you for your trouble and your time! I do appreciate it!

P.S.: Should I not update to the beta of the new LoL client before I get a response back about the ticket?
You can feel free to upgrade to the Beta client if you'd like, since it doesn't really affect anything post-champion select.
I know it's the weekend of Thanksgiving, but I would really appreciate it if you gave me some help with this.

Since you've already submitted a ticket, you'll want to wait for a tech specialist to get back to you. Since that specific specialist will have access to your system logs, it will be far easier to troubleshoot this in that capacity. 

There is a bit of a delay in response times, as the Beta Client has obviously been a hot topic for support lately, so you may need to remain patient for a bit longer.

Let me know if you have any questions.
But through what medium will they get in touch with me? Just wanted to ask you again.
It will be on your support ticket. Visit [Riot Support](http://support.riotgames.com), login to your account, then you can view and reply to your ticket.
Also, other games on my computer are lagging as well, if that helps with anything? Is there a way to fix that? Cuz League, Elsword, and online games are taking forever.

Ok, thank you! I will be patient. Just to give me something to hold onto, do you think they'll get back to me soon? Within a week? 5 days? 4 days? Etc.? If you don't know, that's totally fine but I was just wondering.

Also, would you suggest me trying to uninstall and reinstall the game?

Now, my launcher is greyed out. I can see what's on there but it's covered up with a translucent black veil, as if it's still loading. I don't know what exactly to do now, so I'm going to try reinstalling it.

Ok! By what time will they be able to diagnose what's happening? It's a hard job, I know, so I know that it won't be fairly soon. That's alright by me! You guys do things well, but it takes hard work and dedication and that doesn't come in a day. Thank you so much for all your help!
